org.coniks.coniks_server

Class KeyChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.Operation
      • org.coniks.coniks_server.KeyChange

  • public class KeyChange
extends Operation
    Implements a key change operation.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.coniks.coniks_server.Operation

        epoch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyChange(java.lang.String newKeyData, java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey changeKey, boolean allowsUnsignedChanges, boolean allowsPublicVisibility, byte[] msg, byte[] sig, long epoch, long counter)
      A KeyChange object does the actual work of changing the name-to-key mapping.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyChange

        public KeyChange(java.lang.String newKeyData,
         java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey changeKey,
         boolean allowsUnsignedChanges,
         boolean allowsPublicVisibility,
         byte[] msg,
         byte[] sig,
         long epoch,
         long counter)
        A KeyChange object does the actual work of changing the name-to-key mapping.
        Parameters:
        newKeyData - the new key data for the mapping
        changeKey - the new change key for the mapping
        allowsUnsignedChanges - whether the user allows unsigned mapping changes
        allowsPublicVisibility - whether the user allows her maping to be publicly visible
        msg - the mapping change message
        sig - the digital signature on the mapping change message
        epoch - the epoch during which the mapping was last changed
        counter - the change count for the given epoch (used to order the changes)

    • Method Detail

      • getCounter

        public long getCounter()
        Gets the change counter for this KeyChange operation.
        Returns:
        the counter as a long.

      • canChangeInfo

        public boolean canChangeInfo(UserLeafNode uln)
        Verifies whether the the mapping change is possible given the user's mapping change policy.
        Parameters:
        uln - the key directory entry for which to make the check.
        Returns:
        true if it the mapping can be changed, false otherwise

      • changeInfo

        public boolean changeInfo(UserLeafNode uln)
        Changes a mapping if the user's allows it.
        Parameters:
        uln - the key directory entry to change
        Returns:
        true if the change succeeded, false otherwise.
